definition: forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
to retire from the military, sport etc/to demobilize/to decommission/retired from use
to serve in the army/in active service
to accomplish the whole task at one stroke (idiom)
pinyin: bi4 qi2 gong1 yu2 yi1 yi4

definition: Huaihai Campaign (Nov 1948-Jan 1949), one of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War, considered the determining battle of the war
Liaoshen Campaign (Sep-Nov 1948), the first of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War
Pingjin Campaign (Nov 1948-Jan 1949), one of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War
forced labor/corvée (labor required of a serf)/animal labor

sentences.english: You ever served in an infantry unit, son?
sentences.chinese: 你曾在步兵团服过役吗，小子？

sentences.english: A veteran should be entitled to special treatment because of his service in war.
sentences.chinese: 老兵因在战时服过役应享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: He saw service in both World Wars.
sentences.chinese: 他在两次世界大战中都服过役。

sentences.english: But it is also very dangerous because burn-through might happen during welding.
sentences.chinese: 但是在役焊接时可能发生烧穿，有很大危险性。

sentences.english: They visited the site of first world war battle.
sentences.chinese: 他们参观了第一次世界大战役遗址。

sentences.english: The offer also applies to active duty reservists.
sentences.chinese: 这项优惠同样适用于现职的后备役人员。

sentences.english: The traditional plant-eating livestock of Guangdong province is draught buffalo.
sentences.chinese: 广东传统的草食家畜主要是役用水牛。

sentences.english: I know nothing about his having served in the army.
sentences.chinese: 我一点也不知道他服过役。

sentences.english: Clearly intelligence encompasses more than a score on a test.
sentences.chinese: 毫无役鹗，智力包含的不仅仅是一次测试所得的分数。

sentences.english: Cable automatic climbing was the key problem of the maintenance robotization for in-service cables.
sentences.chinese: 缆索自动爬升是在役缆索维护机器人化的最关键问题。

sentences.english: The values of conscription by voluntary officers in Air Force.
sentences.chinese: 空军志愿役官士兵对义务役士兵价值评估。

definition: to lose a war/fig. the loser (in a competition or election)
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
to be utterly defeated/to be routed
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to fight with all one's might
to cross swords/to have a confrontation (with sb)
